member.name: T:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`2
member.summary: Main container for all responses from the API that return content.

member.name: T:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1
member.summary: Main container for all responses from the API that do not have return content. This class can also be used for the responses that do not contain Json deserializable contact. For instance, if the response will be a pdf file, then we can't use the Json deserializer to get the PDF file.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.#ctor(LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestResponse)
member.summary: Creates a CommonResourceResponse for the given CommonRestResponse.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.Deserialize``1(LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestResponse)
member.summary: Desirializes the response content according to the ContentType.
member.typeparam: The type of object to deserialize to

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.Success
member.summary: True if the API call was a success. This includes both HTTP Ok (200) and HTTP Created (201) status codes.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.StatusCode
member.summary: The HTTP Status code of the response.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.ErrorContent
member.summary: The content of the body for an API call that resulted in an error.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`1.Response
member.summary: Access to the more detailed response.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`2.#ctor(LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestResponse)
member.summary: Creates a CommonResourceResponse for the give CommonRestResponse.
member.param: The to create this response from.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonResourceResponse`2.Content
member.summary: The content of the body for a successful API call.

member.name: T:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient
member.summary: Holds default RESTful client side calls. Right now, this is basically a wrapper for RestSharp but doing this easily allows us to change our underlying REST calls without having to modify existing code that reference it.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a connection to the Lone Wolf API using the specified parameters.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.OnBeforeExecute(LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest)
member.summary: Used to allow an overriding class to handle any actions before actual execution of the request.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.CreateRequest(System.String,LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.Method,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a object.
member.param: Optional. The object to add to the body of the request.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.Execute(LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest)
member.summary: Performs the REST request.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.Log
member.summary: Access to the CommonLogger.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestClient.UserAgent
member.summary: Allows an overriding class to change the user agent that will be sent in all requests.

member.name: T:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest
member.summary: Used for created REST requests.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.#ctor(System.String,LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.Method)
member.summary: Creates a REST request for the given resource and HTTP method.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.AddHeader(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a header to the request.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.GetHeader(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the value of the specified header.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.AddParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a parameter to the request. For GET requests, this will end up in the query string. For POST requests, this will end up in the body.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.SetParameter(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets a parameter in the request. If the parameter does not exist, then it will be added. If it does exist, then its value will be updated.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.RemoveParameter(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a parameter from the request.
member.param: The name of the parameter to remove.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.AddBody(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an object to the request body. This object will be serialized according to the serializer chosen for the CommonRestRequest. Currently, this is always set to be Json.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.AddFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the request making this a multipart request.
member.param: The name of the parameter for the file.
The full path to the file.

member.name: M:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.AddFile(System.String,System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the request making this a multipart request.
member.param: The name of the parameter for the file.
The byte array representing the file.
The name to use for the file.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.Resource
member.summary: The resource uri for the request.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.Body
member.summary: Returns the Body as a string. Use to add body content.

member.name: P:LoneWolf.Common.WebApi.Rest.CommonRestRequest.Method
member.summary: The HTTP Method for the request.
